name: stat-substitution
description: Advising conversation about substituting STAT 350 from another college for the CSC stats requirement.

events.content: Has anyone successfully counted STAT 350 from the College of Science toward the CSC stats requirement? My Degree Planner still flags it.
I took STAT 350 at COSAM too and it initially showed as "support elective". Took a few emails to fix.
Advising says it’s allowed as long as the syllabus matches STAT 366 content. Fill out the Major/Support Substitution form, include the syllabus, and send it to cscadvising@calpoly.edu.
Right. The department chair signs off once they confirm hypothesis testing and regression are covered. Expect about a one-week turnaround.
Don’t forget to attach proof you earned at least a C-. They’ll reject it if the transcript screenshot is missing.
Awesome, I’ll submit the substitution form tonight. Thanks all!
